changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE kpfu_sms_filter_data.data_set ( data_set_id BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('kpfu_sms_filter_data.sms_filter_master_seq'::regclass) , data_set_name text NOT NULL , data_set_created_ts timestamp without time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , data_set_updated_ts timestamp without time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , data_set_deleted_ts timestamp without time zone , data_set_is_deleted boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false , CONSTRAINT data_set_id_pkey PRIMARY KEY (data_set_id) , CONSTRAINT data_set_id_check CHECK (data_set_id >= 1000000000000001::bigint AND data_set_id <=1999999999999999::bigint) );
